sn14.39:4.2: “Mendicants, there are ascetics and brahmins who don’t understand the earth element, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn14.39:4.3: They don’t understand the water element …
sn14.39:4.6: Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and don’t live having achieved it with their own insight.
sn14.39:5.1: There are ascetics and brahmins who do understand the earth element, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation.
sn14.39:5.3: They do understand the water element …
sn14.39:5.6: Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having achieved it with their own insight.”
sn14.39:9.1: The Linked Discourses on the elements are complete.
